nodes.text: Bocatts were reptilian creatures native to the desert planet Tatooine. A small population of bocatts also lived in the atrium of Tansarii Point Station.
They had brown, leathery hide and two tusks.
Bocatts appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
